name: groupprojectis403
description: ### Step 1: Clone the Repository 1. Open VS Code and go to **View > Terminal** to open the integrated terminal. 2. In the terminal, navigate to the folder where you want to store the project. 3. Clone the Repository by running the following command (this creates a copy of the repo on your computer):    - `git clone https://github.com/benhagg/GroupProjectIS403.git` 4. Once cloning is complete, open the project in VS Code:    - Go to **File > Open Folder...** and select the `GroupProjectIS403` folder.
